SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BigPotions
Représente une grande potion dans le jeu.
Character
The Character class represents a player character in the game.
Classic
The Classic class implements the Interactable interface, providing a specific interaction scenario for the game.
DefensiveEquipment
Abstract class representing defensive equipment in the game.
Dragon
The Dragon class represents a specific type of enemy in the game.
Ennemies
The Ennemies class is an abstract representation of an enemy in the game.
Epee
The Epee class represents a specific type of offensive equipment in the game.
FireBall
The FireBall class represents a specific type of offensive spell in the game.
Game
This class represents the main game.
GameMenu
Enumération représentant les différents menus et messages affichés dans le jeu.
Goblin
The Goblin class represents a specific type of enemy in the game.
Interactable
The Interactable interface defines a contract for objects that can interact with a character and a menu in the game.
LightningBolt
The LightningBolt class represents a specific type of offensive spell in the game.
Main
Play
Menu
The Menu class handles the display and management of various game menus.
OffensiveEquipment
The OffensiveEquipment class serves as an abstract base class for all offensive equipment in the game, providing common functionality for modifying a character's offensive capabilities.
Philtre
The Philtre class represents a defensive equipment item in the game.
Potions
Classe abstraite représentant une potion dans le jeu.
Shield
The Shield class represents a defensive equipment item in the game.
Sledgehammer
The Sledgehammer class represents a type of offensive equipment in the game, specifically a heavy weapon.
SmallPotions
Représente une petite potion dans le jeu.
Warriors
The Warriors class represents a specific type of character in the game, which is a warrior.
Witch
The Witch class represents a specific type of enemy in the game.
Wizards
The Wizards class represents a specific type of character in the game, which is a wizard.
